Package me.yleoft.zAPI.command

Interface CommandBasis

All Superinterfaces:
org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter
All Known Subinterfaces:
Command, SubCommand
public interface CommandBasis extends org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter
Basis for commands with subcommands and parameters.

    onTabComplete(@NotNull org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, org.bukkit.command.Command command, @NotNull String label, @NotNull String @NotNull [] args)
     
    default @NotNull CommandBasis.ParameterParseResult
    parseAndExecuteParameters(@NotNull org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, @NotNull String[] fullArgs, @NotNull String[] args)
    Updated rules: - Parses parameters ANYWHERE in args for this command level (not inherited by parents/subcommands) - Parameters are not repeatable - Only triggers if sender has the parameter permission (if set) - Parameter args are taken greedily until: - maxArgs reached, OR - the next token is another known "-param" - Parameter tokens + their args are REMOVED from the args passed down to execute/subcommand logic

    • parseAndExecuteParameters

      @NotNull default @NotNull CommandBasis.ParameterParseResult parseAndExecuteParameters(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, @NotNull @NotNull String[] fullArgs, @NotNull @NotNull String[] args)
      Updated rules: - Parses parameters ANYWHERE in args for this command level (not inherited by parents/subcommands) - Parameters are not repeatable - Only triggers if sender has the parameter permission (if set) - Parameter args are taken greedily until: - maxArgs reached, OR - the next token is another known "-param" - Parameter tokens + their args are REMOVED from the args passed down to execute/subcommand logic

    • findActiveParameterTabContext

      @Nullable default @Nullable CommandBasis.ParameterTabContext findActiveParameterTabContext(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, @NotNull @NotNull String[] args)
      If the user is currently typing args for SOME parameter in this args list (this command level), return which parameter and the args typed for it so far. Otherwise null. Respects maxArgs(): once maxArgs are already provided, this returns null (no more parameter-arg tab).

    • findParameter

      @Nullable default @Nullable Parameter findParameter(@NotNull @NotNull List<Parameter> list, @NotNull @NotNull String nameOrAlias)

    • dispatchTabComplete

      @NotNull default @NotNull List<String> dispatchTabComplete(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, @NotNull @NotNull String[] fullArgs, @NotNull @NotNull String[] args)

    • suggestParameters

      @NotNull default @NotNull List<String> suggestParameters(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
      Suggest parameters only after user typed '-', and only if permission is satisfied. Returns "-name" and "-alias" forms.

    • tabComplete

      @NotNull default @NotNull List<String> tabComplete(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, @NotNull @NotNull String[] fullArgs, @NotNull @NotNull String[] args)

    • filterCompletions

      @NotNull default @NotNull List<String> filterCompletions(@NotNull @NotNull String[] args, @NotNull @NotNull Collection<String> candidates)
      Filters candidates by a prefix (case-insensitive). Also removes duplicates while preserving order.
      Parameters:
      args - The command arguments.
      candidates - The collection of candidate completions.
      Returns:
      A list of filtered completions.
